components.description:
An analog, handheld timepiece used to measure elapsed time, as for athletic sprints. Appearance varies across platforms, but depicted with two or more control buttons on its top.

Used for various content concerning time. Not to be confused with ⏰ Alarm Clock or other clock emojis.
components.title: Stopwatch

description:
An analog, handheld timepiece used to measure elapsed time, as for athletic sprints. Appearance varies across platforms, but depicted with two or more control buttons on its top.

Used for various content concerning time. Not to be confused with ⏰ Alarm Clock or other clock emojis.
title: Stopwatch

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.definition: Stopwatch was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015. Copy and paste this emoji: Copy http://emojipedia.org/stopwatch/
emoji_net_data.name: stopwatch

bn:00085147v: To measure or record the time, duration, or rate of.
Measure the time or duration of an event or action or the person who performs an action in a certain period of time
To measure the amount of time an object takes to complete a course (e.g., "to clock a race car").

bn:00025538n: A date on or before which something must be completed.
Date on or before which something must be completed.
A date within each assignment by which submission, review and approval should be completed.
The date by which some task or action should be completed.
The point in time at which something must be completed
An option that allows the user to set the date by which a To Do needs to be completed.
A target date that indicates when you want a task to be completed and allows you to track the status of the task against that target without imposing a constraint on the schedule.

bn:00074440n: A timepiece that can be started or stopped for exact timing (as of a race)
Handheld timepiece designed to measure an amount time
A timepiece designed to measure the amount of time elapsed from a particular time when activated and when the piece is deactivated.
A stop watch is a handheld timepiece designed to measure the amount of time elapsed from a particular time when it is activated to the time when the piece is deactivated.

bn:00019887n: A clock is an instrument to indicate, keep, and co-ordinate time.
A timepiece that shows the time of day
An instrument used to measure or keep track of time.
Instrument to measure or keep track of time.
An instrument used to measure or keep track of time; a non-portable timepiece.

apple_vendor_description: The stopwatch emoji on Apple devices is a dynamic representation of timekeeping, featuring a sleek, metallic casing with a visible dial and a distinct button, all rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting. Its smooth gradients and soft rounded edges give it a polished, modern feel, symbolizing the passage of time, a race, or an urgent deadline. This emoji is perfect for conveying a sense of urgency, competition, or the tracking of moments.
